title: Adoption assistance program established
context: [PART XII.] ADOPTION ASSISTANCE [ยง346-301] Adoption assistance program established. The department of human services shall maintain an adoption assistance program to facilitate the adoption of children with special needs. [L 1992, c 190, pt of ยง1] Cross References Adoption assistance compact, see chapter 350C. Interstate compact on placement of children, see chapter 350E.
